# Draft:Grandstand Glassware & Apparel

----
Grandstand Glassware & Apparel is a printing and merchandise manufacturing company based in Lawrence, Kansas, United States. The company provides custom printing, branding, and fulfillment services for drinkware, apparel, packaging, and promotional products to commercial clients throughout the United States.
History Grandstand was founded in 1988 by Chris Piper, a former University of Kansas basketball player and 1988 NCAA national champion, as a small T-shirt printing business in Lawrence, Kansas. The company began printing designs on glassware for local breweries during the 1990s. The Lawrence Journal-World reported that by the early 2010s, Grandstand had produced over 1.3 million amber glass growlers and cited the company as the largest producer of amber glass growlers in the United States as of 2013.
In 2011, Grandstand relocated to a 150,000-square-foot facility in the East Hills Business Park, purchasing the former Sauer-Danfoss building. By 2018, the company employed more than 200 people. That year, the City of Lawrence approved a five-million-dollar facility expansion for Grandstand through the Catalyst Program, citing increased product demand. The expansion was the subject of local reporting due to the associated tax incentives.
Products and Services Grandstand provides business-to-business printing and branding services for commercial products. Its operations include:
•	Screen and digital printing on drinkware such as pint glasses, can glasses, and growlers
•	Digital embossing on glassware
•	Apparel decoration and embroidery
•	Custom packaging and promotional product printing
•	Order fulfillment and warehousing for clients in the beverage and hospitality industries
In-house Design Group Grandstand operates a design department known as 88 Design Group, also referred to as Grandstand Creative. The group provides design and branding services for breweries, distilleries, and other beverage companies. The 88 Design Group has won multiple accolades from the Craft Beer Marketing Awards, including two Platinum Crushie trophies in 2020 for Best Logo Design and Best Merchandise Design. In 2022, the group received a Global Crushie for LUKI Brewery's 'Circus-in-a-Box' package design, along with several Gold Crushies for other packaging projects.
